<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Check a conversation CRM status"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/mail/conversations/link/crm/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Checks if a conversation is CRM linked or not by message ID.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"message_id":{"description":"ID of any messages from the conversation","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Conversation CRM status","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"MessageId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"12354"},"IsLinked":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"}},"title":"MailCrmStatus"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
